extension.summary: inadyn: is a free DynDNS client
extension.description: INADYN is a free DynDNS client. It gives the possibility to have your own fixed hostname registered on the internet, although your IP might be changing. Supports the following dynamic DNS services: dyndns.org, freedns.afraid.org, zoneedit.com, no-ip.com, easydns.com, tzo.com, 3322.org, dnsomatic.com, tunnelbroker.net, dns.he.net, dynsip.org, sitelutions.com, dnsexit.com, changeip.com, zerigo.com, dhis.org
